improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero.  The value of x will be -49 after the for loop, and y is 3. The division x/y will not result in an error, but the result will be an unexpected value. Consider adding input validation or handling the potential for division by zero.
The loop iterates 49 times, decreasing x by 1 each time.  This could be simplified to x = x - 49; The value of x will be -49 after the loop.
